name: Boxes of Guns
description:
Do you enjoy winning? But, don't like trying for it.

Do you enjoy giving away your money?

Well Boxes of Guns is the game for you, you can give us all you money in order to win.

This game was created in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40 by Reecer9714 and Executive. The theme was the more you have the worse it is. So, we created a parody game about having too much pay to win, a lacking base game, and DLC to milk players for money.
